report.title: Whew! Passed
report.author: Passed
report.bodytext: This is for people worrying about cocaine and a DT. I had to get a background check/drug test for my job. Failure would've ruined my life so I was anxious. For cocaine I was 84 hours clean and passed. I had to get a background check through the company Hireright and the whole process took 8 days. This is just for reference for those worrying about not receiving results. I worried my rear off thinking the long wait was bad. /n /n Body type 5'9', athletic, ~10-15% body fat 163 pounds.
